result.reason: Smart/virtual dynamic groups (connected, recent) require a significant new subsystem for live connection state tracking and virtual tree nodes — out of scope for current bug-fix focused releases and not planned in roadmap.
result.approach: Would need a VirtualGroupInfo class with live-query semantics (filter by connection state or last-used timestamp), hooked into the connection tree refresh cycle; deferred indefinitely.
